Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: a path through the dark forest

Base:Description.spring: A path winding through the thick forest, canopied by verdant new leaves. The air is scented with the loamy freshness of spring. Sunlight dapples the ground in flickering light as the breeze dances through the trees. Birdsong can be heard in the distance.Flickering glimpses of moonlight drift through the branches to dance over the ground while the peeping calls of tree frogs carry over the breeze.
Base:Description.summer: A narrow path winding through the thick forest. A heavy canopy of leaves stretches over the trail and the breeze is heavy and warm with the heat of summer. The thickness of the foliage allows only a diffused light to illuminate the path. All around you is the perpetual cadence of insect sounds.The thickness of the foliage overhead fills the path and surrounding forest with impenetrable darkness. A lone cicada in the distance cries out its repetitive and piercing song.
Base:Description.autumn: A narrow, winding path through the densely treed forest. The thinning canopy overhead is a painter's palette of reds, golds, browns and yellows. The rich autumnal scent of dried leaves wafts through on the breeze. The colored foliage above infuses the area in a rich, golden light. Birds rifle through the fallen leaves before quickly flitting away into the distance.Slivers of moonlight pierce the foliage and dance over the leaf-strewn ground.
Base:Description.winter: A frost-covered path winding through the thick forest. The branches over the trail are void of leaves and the air is crisp and cold. Sunlight floods through the leafless canopy but does little to warm the area. The icy clatter of branches shifting in the breeze occasionally echoes through the surrounding forest. The starry sky above is broken only by the canopy of bare branches that crackle with an icy clatter whenever the breeze blows through.

The thickness of the foliage allows only a diffused light to illuminate the path.The thickness of the foliage overhead fills the path and surrounding forest with impenetrable darkness.

Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: The thick underbrush covers the forest floor.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[S] \{ A solitary leaf falls slowly to the ground. \| An occasional crunching of leaves and twigs can be heard. \| A fleeting disturbance can be heard among the underbrush. \| Something brushes against your leg. \| The air is alive with the sound of nature. \| The sweet scent of pine trees assaults your senses. \| Somewhere deep in the forest, a \{man\|woman\} \{laughs\|cackles\}. \| A \{spotted\|small\|large\|fat\|striped\} lizard with webbed feet crawls up a tree. \| \Somewhere above you, an owl hoots.\\The sun shines through the trees casting puddles of light on the ground.\ \| \A foreboding silence falls over the forest for a moment.\\Birds chirp happily among the branches\ \| \Bright eyes seem to be watching you from the darkness.\\A large lizard pokes its head from the underbrush and stares at you before disappearing again.\ \}

X[S] \{ A solitary leaf falls slowly to the ground. \| An occasional crunching of leaves and twigs can be heard. \| A fleeting disturbance can be heard among the underbrush. \| Something brushes against your leg. \| The air is alive with the sound of nature. \| The sweet scent of pine trees assaults your senses. \| Somewhere deep in the forest, a \{man\|woman\} \{laughs\|cackles\}. \| A \{spotted\|small\|large\|fat\|striped\} lizard with webbed feet crawls up a tree. \| \Somewhere above you, an owl hoots.\\The sun shines through the trees casting puddles of light on the ground.\ \| \A foreboding silence falls over the forest for a moment.\\Birds chirp happily among the branches\ \| \Bright eyes seem to be watching you from the darkness.\\A large lizard pokes its head from the underbrush and stares at you before disappearing again.\ \}
